# Project Setup Instructions

## Project Type
React SIP Calculator using Vite

## Status
- [x] Copilot instructions created
- [x] Project scaffolded
- [x] Dependencies installed
- [x] SIP calculator customized
- [x] Development server running
- [x] Documentation complete

## Features
- Interactive SIP calculator with real-time calculations
- Adjustable sliders for investment amount, return rate, and time period
- Responsive design with dark/light mode support
- Built with React 18 and Vite for optimal performance
